attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a study into the health & genetic damage suffered by the Children, Grandchildren & Great-grandchildren of Britains Nuclear Tests Veterans as recomended by the Parliamentary enquiry held on the 15th & 16th October 2007.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
